always @(posedge core_clk) begin

    core_ilas_captured <= 1'b0;

    if (core_ilas_config_valid == 1'b1 && core_ilas_config_addr == ILAS_DATA_LENGTH-1) begin
      core_ilas_captured <= 1'b1;
    end
  end
end
